Get IMPACT annotation key

Source: R/IMPACT.R
IMPACT.get_annotation_key.Rd

Inlcludes the study source, tissue,cell type/line, and cell subtype of each of the 500 annotations in IMPACT.

IMPACT.get_annotation_key(
 
    URL = "https://github.com/immunogenomics/IMPACT/raw/master/IMPACT707/IMPACT_annotation_key.txt",
  save_path = "./IMPACT/IMPACT_annotation_key.txt.gz",
  save_key = F,
  force_new_download = F,
  verbose = T
)

See also

Other IMPACT: IMPACT.get_annotations(), IMPACT.get_top_annotations(), IMPACT.iterate_get_annotations(), IMPACT.postprocess_annotations(), IMPACT.snp_group_boxplot(), IMPACT_annotation_key, IMPACT_heatmap(), prepare_mat_meta()

Examples

annot.key <- IMPACT.get_annotation_key(save_key=F)
#> [1] "+ IMPACT:: Downloading annotation key from GitHub..."
head(annot.key)
#>    Accession    TF    Tissue                 Cell IMPACT
#> 1: GSM449525  ETS1     BLOOD  Jurkat (Clone E6-1)      1
#> 2: GSM449526 RUNX1     BLOOD  Jurkat (Clone E6-1)      2
#> 3: GSM468213  RXRA     BLOOD                 UPR9      3
#> 4: GSM468214  RXRA     BLOOD                 UPR9      3
#> 5: GSM534471  CTCF ADIPOCYTE Adipose stromal cell      4
#> 6: GSM534478  CTCF ADIPOCYTE Adipose stromal cell      4
#>                                            File      CellDeriv  Annot
#> 1:  PRJNA119913_GSM449525_ETS1_peaks.narrowPeak         T.cell Annot1
#> 2: PRJNA119913_GSM449526_RUNX1_peaks.narrowPeak         T cell Annot2
#> 3:  PRJNA121283_GSM468213_RXRA_peaks.narrowPeak        Myeloid Annot3
#> 4:  PRJNA121283_GSM468214_RXRA_peaks.narrowPeak        Myeloid Annot3
#> 5:  PRJNA126099_GSM534471_CTCF_peaks.narrowPeak Adipose stroma Annot4
#> 6:  PRJNA126099_GSM534478_CTCF_peaks.narrowPeak Adipose stroma Annot4
